text: Jane, I'm feeling quite overwhelmed with everything since my recent diagnosis of bipolar disorder. It's a lot to take in, but I'm trying to stay positive and follow the treatment plan.
I'm looking forward to the seminar next week, especially the part about coping strategies for my recent diagnosis of bipolar disorder. It's something positive to focus on.
Thank you for your support, Jane. Having someone to talk to about my recent diagnosis of bipolar disorder means a lot to me during this challenging time.
